name: Temptation Islands
content: Two girls on the road to become stars
两个女孩走在明星路上
On the road to travelling far
Two girls on the road to burning hearts
两个女孩走在燃烧生命的路上
On the road to shimmering cars
On the road which they never had seen
Come with us and you will see
跟随着我们，你便会看到
In the mood of setting you free
Come with us and you can be free
跟随着我们，你便会看到
On the road, come along, you will see
一路上，独自来到，你会看到
Come with us and you can be free
跟随着我们，你便会看到
